data.message: Why did you stop making Coke Life it was the best you did,  I for one will not be buying coke anymore

replies.message: Well, Coke said that they got rid of it was due to poor sales and this drink selling more.

Hi Mandy, we’re looking to make it clearer for consumers to differentiate between our sugar and no-sugar options. Now feels the right time to phase out Coca-Cola Life from the UK market and focus on our three leading cola variants. Thanks :)
Someone liked it? Thought it tasted naff. And Coca-Cola basically nobody bought it.
full of aspartame now instead?
100% stevia coke would be good. Not that half and half stuff.
Coca-Cola When will you improve quality of coke variants.  I love original coco cola but, the coke zero taste bland, like diet coke. I want to  have same great taste.
Ravi since they changed Coke Zero it tastes absolutely wonderful!
Bring back coke life, it was the best, a cherry version would be awesome
Coca-Cola I too preferred Coke Life. Coke Zero tastes disgusting.
Hovis best of both
Becca Hart
Callum Sweeney wow!!! I may live off this xx
"I for one will not be buying coke again". Oh no, whatever will a multi billion dollar beverage company do without their precious Mandy.
It was the best along with the old school lemon and lime. Get that out the diet and into the regular range!
Hi Ravi, we're sorry to hear you dislike the taste of our variants. However, be sure that we'll share your comments with our team. Thanks
Coke Zero for the win! It helped me get rid of full fat Coke 😂
Coke life was nasty I'm glad it's gone.
Coke life was stinking! Tried it a couple of times. It seemed fizzier than coke or coke zero and just didnt taste right! The new coke zero is spot on
Coke Zero is great, I couldn't take to Diet Coke but find the Zero is close to the Real Thing 👍
Coke life was rancid, not missed
Christopher Kenrick must be all those mind-control narcotics they add :)
Pretty sure you woulda drank any of the other cokes before life came along
Beautiful taste and very good for my level of sugar and the flavour is superb
I was excited about coke life until seeing it still had sugar in it. I want natural sweetening but 100% sugar free. Why not do a stevia/erythritol version?

Hi Linda, thanks for getting in touch with us. We're always looking at new and exciting ways to innovate our brands based on consumer needs and their changing lifestyles. We'll be sure to share your comments with our team. Thanks
